body:
Ok guys i know that i created a topic like this again yesterday.  You guys keep saying it was a 1.8 glitch, however you were all wrong.  Today i was working on my prison again when I came across this sign in (this is what it said)


Not a glitch
Null Null
Null Null

(i would have the screenshot but i can't get it to work http://avicus.net/forums/75853dd76 )

You guys are my friends and i know that you will give me your honest opinion.  Please no hate comments and take my word on this.  "He" is starting to place signs where i haven't.  I wish i knew how to place screenshots but i can't get it to work.  Thank you

-Tarheelkiwi

title: Null again ?!?!?!?!?

replies.body: Again as I said in the last topic I have seen this in my world. Empty spaces are filled with the word null. And for some reason my chests were empty :O Dat b****
